turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a something from Peet's Cafe.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, give me some whole milk in that, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i order that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a large golden caffe latte with whole milk at the peet's in serramonte center, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's fine. Thank you very much.
